Index.meta_description: Revolutionary AI vision software that helps you study smarter by providing real-time answers and explanations for your practice tests.

Hero.title: Master Your Tests with <important>AI-Powered Vision Technology</important>
Hero.description: Revolutionary software that uses AI vision to analyze your practice tests in real-time, providing instant answers and detailed explanations right on your phone while you study.

Features.section_description: Our AI-powered vision technology transforms how you practice and learn, making study sessions more efficient and effective.
Features.feature_description: Experience the future of studying with our advanced AI vision technology that understands and explains your practice tests in real-time.

Pricing.section_description: Select the perfect plan to enhance your study sessions with AI-powered assistance.

FAQ.question: How does IntiTutor's AI vision technology work?
FAQ.answer: IntiTutor uses advanced AI vision technology to analyze your practice tests in real-time. Simply take a screenshot or connect your phone to your computer using our adapter, and our AI will instantly provide answers and detailed explanations on your mobile device.

CTA.title: Ready to Transform Your Study Sessions?
CTA.description: Join thousands of students who are already studying smarter with IntiTutor.
